title: Advertise a Vacant Rental Unit
description: A rental unit will be vacant soon. The manager needs to create a listing and post it to multiple rental websites.

tasks.description: Gather details for the vacant unit, including rent price, photos, and amenities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information for the listing.

tasks.description: Write a compelling rental listing description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an attractive and accurate description of the unit.

tasks.description: Syndicate the listing to Zillow, Apartments.com, and other rental platforms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully posts the rental listing to multiple websites.
